sentences.sContent: Many politicians are trying to ingratiate themselves with her.
sentences.sCn: 很多政客都在试图讨她的欢心。

remMethod.val: in(使) + grat(感激) + iate → 使别人感激自己 → 讨别人欢心 → 讨好

words.tran: 逢迎的，讨好的；迷人的，吸引人的

trans.tranOther: If someone tries to ingratiate themselves with you, they do things to try and make you like them
